direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods close a user data stream but for different types (Spot vs. Margin).
Both methods close a user data stream but for different types (Spot vs. Isolated Margin).
Both methods handle user data streams with similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods involve operations on user data streams, though one creates and the other closes.

enhanced_by.reason: Creating a listen key is a prerequisite for closing it.
Extending a listen key might need to be tested in conjunction with closing it.
A custom method to verify the listen key is closed can be used for assertions.
